Datavisualizations

Storytelling-based series of datavisualizations. Digital prototype, presented in a 'choose your story'-style, based on data from a survey.

Description

Exploring Charts.js in combination with Vue.js

This assignment was also originally meant not to be be made with code, but I really wanted to polish up my Vue-skills after not using it for several months. I've made use of ChartsJS for the charts/datavisualizations and turned this project into a data-driven story.
